org.apache.ignite.ml.util.genetic

Class Chromosome

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.util.genetic.Chromosome
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable

    public class Chromosome
extends Object
implements Comparable
    Represents the set of genes, known as chromosome in genetic programming. Note: this class has a natural ordering that is inconsistent with equals.
